title: Adani Energy forms JV with Abu Dhabi's IHC-backed firm for smart-meter business
description: Adani Energy Solutions has joined forces with a company supported by Abu Dhabi's International Holding Company (IHC) to expand its smart meter business in India and globally. The subsidiary of Adani Energy acquired a 49% stake in UAE-based Esyasoft Holdings, which is primarily owned by IHC. The collaboration aims to enhance Adani Energy's domestic smart meter business and extend its global presence using Esyasoft's network across more than ten countries
